OOC: Just by curiosity, what does Blackheart look like?

Bic:

Tyrael bowe slightly in front of the screen.

Tyrael: Thank you Rodimus. Though we are now enemies, I hope I don't
have to fight you soon. Tyrael out.

He shut off the communication station and started to walk away, back
to Blackheart.

Tyrael: Rodimus is a valiant warrior, but he is naive too. He accepted
the cease-fire pretexting the Beast Wars concerned him more, but he
doesn't realize that the Tripredacus are as much a part of the Beast
Wars as any other group on this planet. So, General Blackheart, what
is our main goal for now?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Roddy opens a return channel.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: This is Commander Prime at Maximal HQ. It's good to
hear from you, Tyrael. I had heard some stories of what your fellow
Tripredacus have done on Cybertron, and what they plan to do here.
Under normal circumstances I would have to fight your forces, but I'm
more concerned with the Beat Wars right now. So I agree to the cease
fire. The Predacons are more important right now.
